text: tatha hamane moosa ko pustak (tauraat) pradaan kee aur usake pashchaat nirantar rasool bheje aur hamane maryam ke putr eesa ko khulee nishaaniyaan deen aur roohî€¼ul qudus[1] dvaara use samarthan diya, to kya jab bhee koee rasool tumhaaree apanee manamaanee ke virudhd koee baat tumhaare paas lekar aaya, to tum akad gaye, atah kuchh nabiyon ko jhuthala diya aur kuchh kee hatya karane lage
